tool_description: Generates recommendations based on similar users' reading preferences using collaborative filtering techniques.

user_book_ratings.description: User's ratings for books they've read

user_book_titles.description: Titles of books the user has rated

community_size.description: Number of similar users to consider (10-1000)

min_common_books.description: Minimum books in common to consider users similar (2-20)

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: user_book_ratings and user_book_titles must have the same length.
Insufficient ratings: Need at least 3 book ratings for collaborative filtering.
Invalid community size: Must be between 10 and 1000.
Invalid min_common_books: Must be between 2 and 20.
Invalid recommendation count: Must be between 5 and 50.
No similar users found: Unable to find users with sufficient overlap in reading history.
usage: Provide user_book_ratings and user_book_titles arrays. Optionally set community_size, min_common_books, and recommendation_count. Returns collaborative recommendations.

recommendation_scores.description: Confidence scores for each recommendation (0-1 scale)

similar_users_count.description: Number of similar users found and used

average_similarity.description: Average similarity score with identified similar users
